resources.string: THE CHARACTER MUST BE IN COLOUR TO HAVE ACCESS
Password should have at least 6 characters
Are you sure you want to delete ?
Are you sure you want to turn your profile
You are not connected to a device
Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.

The red arrows indicate where you need to put the pieces to win. However you must reach level 5 and 11 to have access to grid 4 and 5 respectively, you do not have these restrictions when you play against an online friends.
You must place your 3 pieces in the direction of one of the arrows to win. The grid is available from level 1 to 4 with various difficulties.
You must place your 4 pieces in the direction of one of the arrows to win. The grid is available from level 5 to 10 with various difficulties
You must place your 4 pieces in the direction of one of the arrows to win. The grid is available from level 11 to 15 with varied difficulties
Congratulations on your terrific performance. You made it to the end of the game. We would like to thank you.

string-array.name: vignon
string-array.item: I dare you
You cannot win
Who told you to dare me
That\'s what I am saying you are too weak
I will stop you in the next level
Believe me\, I\'m going to win !
I will not let you win this time
One more draw and you are done
I use sarcasm instead of punching you in the face
You shouldn\'t have tried me
I will stop you this time in the next level
Hello\, I have the urge to win.
Please one more draw
Do not disturb for no reason !
You\'re going to speak again\, aren\'t you ?
Congratulation but John will stop you

string-array.name: john
string-array.item: Let\'s finish this !
I\'m better than Vignon
I don\'t Joke
Don\'t mess with me! I have a stick!
I\'m going to win in the next level
Trust me\, I will be the winner !
Welcome Back\, my friend !
One more draw\, come on !
It\'s much funnier now that I get it
I have cookies for you if you loose.
Hello\,I thought you are not coming back !
Never put a cat on your head.
The decision is maybe and that\'s final !
Did my sarcasm hurt your feels? Get over it.

string-array.name: misterCarrot
string-array.item: Hello\, I was born this way.
Don\'t worry\,I can give you carrots !
Stop\, instead of draw win a little bit
Eat more carrots and come back !
Congratulations\, I guess I need training

string-array.name: misterPatato
string-array.item: Hi\, I\'m Mister Patato !
Its better to look stupid and keep your mouth closed
Oh\, sorry\, it was just technical difficulties.
I\'m not random! I just have lots of thoughts
Congratulations\, I hope Mr Tomato will stop you !

string-array.name: misterTomato
string-array.item: Hi\, My friend!
Do you know\, I\'m the best of Misters
I have a magical box and it is better than yours.
Don\'t mess with me! I have a stick!
Congratulations\,I wish you the best for the rest !

string-array.name: papi
string-array.item: I\'m the best papi ever !
I\'m the best tictactoe player
Back off! The vitory is mine!
No\, dammit! I can\'t show you the way to Sesame Street!
I\'m going to win in the next level
You will ask me to stop winning!
I\'m seeing all your moves
I don\'t Joke
Even my issues have issues
Let\'s finish this !
I\'m thinking about your moves
I hear voices and they donâ€™t like you!
Angry people need hugs or sharp objects
Nobody can win Tictactomania\, Goodluck

string-array.name: tictactomania
string-array.item: Hi\, I\'m not weird\, I\'m gifted!
Never challenge Tictactomania
My imaginary friend thinks you have issues
Don\'t mess with me! I have a stick!
Ok you have won\, by chance
Hi\, from here you cannot go further!
Never set yourself on fire.
That is so typical of a SUDOKU fan!
Sheep are just demented sticks of candy floss
I\'m so skilled in the next level !
Welcome to the final level !
Bananas can be green!
I can think!
You sound like yourself!
Congratulation only a few of you beat\, challenge your friends

string-array.name: levels_array
string-array.item: Vignon
Vignon stupefied
Vignon stunned
John
John surprised
John depressed
Mister Carrot
Mister Patato
Mister Tomato
Papi
Papi Seeing
Papi Thinking
Tictactomania
Tictactomania Fire
Tictactomania Thunder Work

string-array.name: wins_array
string-array.item: Win Vignon 6 times without \'Draw\' to pass
Win Vignon stupefied 5 times with at most \'2 Draws\' to pass
Win Vignon stunned 5 times with at most \'1 Draw\' to pass
You cannot win John but make it draw 10 times to pass
Win John surprised 5 times with at most \'2 Draws\' to pass
Win John depressed 5 times without \'Draw\' to pass
Win Mister Carrot 7 times with at most \'5 Draws\' to pass
Win Mister Patato 8 times with at most \'5 Draws\' to pass
Win Mister Tomato 10 times with at most \'5 Draws\' to pass
You cannot win Papi but make it draw 10 times to pass
Win Papi Seeing 5 times with at most \'1 Draw\' to pass
Win Papi Thinking 5 times without \'Draw\' to pass
Win Tictactomania 7 times with at most \'5 Draws\' to pass
Win Tictactomania Fire 8 times with at most \'5 Draws\' to pass
Win Tictactomania Thunder Work 5 times with at most \'2 Draws\' to end the game
